placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осеннюю сказку Тайланда!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, featuring a tropical beach at sunset with palm trees, complemented by a bright CTA overlay with pricing.".
